AI Description: LibYAML is a YAML 1.1 parser and emitter written in C. It is a library for parsing and emitting YAML data. YAML is a human-readable data serialization format that is commonly used for configuration files and data exchange between languages. LibYAML allows developers to integrate YAML support into their applications.
Core Features: Parsing Yaml Data Into A Native Data Structure, Emitting Native Data Structures Into Valid Yaml Documents, Support For Yaml 1.1 Specification, Written In C For Portability & Efficiency
